p: A Perkin Elmer-Clarus 500 gas chromatograph (Waltham, MA, USA), fitted with a flame ionization detector (FID) and capillary separation column with high polar stationary phase Agilent J&WGC Columns (Thermo-Electron Corporation, Waltham, MA, USA), DB-23 with dimensions of 60 m × 0.250 mm × 0.25 μm, was used for FA determination (method described in [ 12]).
